paragraphs: Hi! I'm Valentin Dumitru, a hardworking, self-reliant and passionate software engineer. My focus right now is graphic programming, c++ and game engines.
This section About me will be about off-topic (not software related) information about me. My lifestyle, skills, passions and mindset.

strengths: Knows when not to be perfectionist
weaknesses: I get demotivated when projects are not following good practices
I rely too much on my technical skills
I get frustrated when things are not going as planned
I can't see my own mistakes sometimes
